title: Aruna Escape - Unique Jungle Villa Near Center
summary:
ARUNA ESCAPE is the newest Villa at Casa Pohon Ubud. It is a luxurious wooden Villa nested by the heart of nature, this dreamy house is a perfect retreat! Slow down and let yourself be surrounded by the best of Ubud Jungle, just 10 minutes ride from the lively Ubud center.

Have a look at our other unique Houses listed on Airbnb! 
And follow us for more visuals at @casapohon

The space
ARUNA ESCAPE seats right by the tree canopy, above the river,  this surroundings brings a cool vibe all year round. Designed as a perfect escape for couples searching for privacy and peace, we proudly present our honeymoon suite, 

It is located within the Casa Pohon Ubud complex, a small eco-friendly resort of only four unique retreats all with their own soul and character. Our friendly local staff of seven will be at your service 24h ensuring you have the best experience possible in and outside your house.

To ensure the best of experience, Aruna comes with a spacious one bedroom with its own lounge area, patio overlooking the forest, garden, jungle bathtub with unbeatable view, and a hanging sofa. 

It also has a en-suite bathroom with hot water shower with a view of the forest. On request, a single bed can be placed in the room to accommodate one additional child or adult. The poolside patio is an extraordinary spot to relax and soaks in the nature and watch the sky through the canopy of trees.

We‚Äôve taken care of all the facilities you need: king size bed with 100% cotton linens, AC, hot water as well as other listed below.

Included with Your Stay:
Daily Breakfasts ‚Äì Start your day with a delicious, heatrtful complimentary breakfast.
Coffee & Tea ‚Äì A selection of various coffees and teas available throughout the day.
Daily Housekeeping ‚Äì Enjoy a clean, fresh room every day.
Evening Turn-Down Service ‚Äì Relax with a beautifully prepared room each evening.
Fast WiFi ‚Äì Stay connected with high-speed internet throughout the property.

Additional Services Available On-Site:
Massages & Spa Services ‚Äì Pamper yourself with rejuvenating treatments at the spa.
Private Yoga Sessions ‚Äì Find your zen with personalized yoga classes.
Driver, Tours & Activities Around Ubud ‚Äì Explore the beauty of Ubud with private drivers and guided tours.
Minibars ‚Äì Stocked with refreshments and snacks for your convenience including champagne, wine, and local spirits.
Scooter Rentals ‚Äì Explore the area on your own with an easy scooter rental.

You'll find several dining options as Ubud center is only 10 minutes away by car. If you wish to have your meals delivered instead, just ask our staff and we‚Äôll take care of everything.

Guest access
The road leading to the villa is small, which can be inconvenient for some drivers. As a result, guests are often dropped off on the road away from the property and have to walk with their luggage. To avoid this inconvenience, we highly recommend booking our driver for private transport service. Simply let us know where you're traveling from, and we'll send you an estimate. This way, you can arrive at our property with ease and without any complications. However, if this happens, please convince your driver that it is a residential area where all sized cars go in and out daily.

Other things to note
Long before our arrival, these scenic rice fields, rivers and rainforests already had tiny insects. We thrive with the highest cleaning and pest control standards and do our best to keep them out of hotel doors. However, some creatures will inevitably pay us a visit. Natural insect repellents are available in the villa should you need one.
location: Entire villa in Kecamatan Ubud, Indonesia

reviews.text:
A stunning place - it really is a magical setting in the trees. Staff were incredibly attentive and communication was brilliant throughout. The setting really is beautiful to switch off. 
It‚Äôs roughly 20 mins outside Ubud centre - and the road to the villa is narrow, so if getting a grab it‚Äôs best to communicate this to the driver. All worth it though for a stunning setting and incredible staff.

My stay at Casa Pohon Ubud was absolutely unforgettable! Nestled in the lush greenery of Ubud, this unique Airbnb truly feels like a treehouse oasis. The design is stunning, blending rustic charm with modern comforts. Every detail, from the wooden interiors to the open-air spaces, was thoughtfully crafted to create a tranquil and immersive experience.

Absolutely incredible place to stay. Truly the best place we have ever rented. All of the staff are so kind and go above and beyond with the service offered. Breakfast was delicious everyday and way more than we expected. Don‚Äôt skip on this place it is worth every penny! Super private and peaceful, you feel like you‚Äôre in your own world.

We absolutely loved our stay here! The place looked exactly like the photos, it was peaceful clean and private. The staff were so helpful, accomodating and friendly. Such a beautiful spot if you enjoy nature and a bit of the jungle. Pool and hot tub were also a highlight! Would love to come back here. Thank you so much for having us üòÑ

Everyone was very friendly. Reception was very responsive and helped with transportation from the airport and to other areas. Pande is a friendly driver that helped with all transportation. He waited for us at stops and would also give recommendations on things to do. The breakfast was delicious and had quite the Balinese touch.

‚ÄúThe villa was great ‚Äì spacious, stylish and perfectly equipped. The staff was incredibly warm and attentive. I was particularly impressed by the tranquility on site ‚Äì ideal to completely relax and escape the ordinary. A real place to feel good. I'd love to come back!‚Äù

This was one of my favorite stays in Bali. Absolutely beautiful place that made for a very memorable stay in Ubud. The staff was great and communicated very quickly whenever we reached out to them with questions or orders. Would absolutely stay here again.

Absolutely the best Airbnb my wife and I have stayed at in Bali. We had the Aruna villa, and I must say this is something special. What a vibe! And what an amazing customer service from the resort. Everything was done with a smile, and kindness.

Stunning setting and beautiful home. Looks exactly like the photos and magical to stay in nature. The service was really friendly with great breakfast options. Relatively close to main town Ubud but will still require a scooter or a taxi.

One of the most stunning jungle stays to experience in Ubud. A great getaway place to relax and chill with nature. The design of the cabin is so detailed and wonderful placed in a green environment. A true place to stay in Bali

What an incredible place. Absolutely gorgeous villa and perfect for a honeymoon stay. The staff were so helpful and responsive. The daily breakfast was phenomenal. I couldn‚Äôt recommend this place more.
The place the people everything was a 10/10. This place is absolutely beautiful! If you‚Äôre thinking about it just do it I highly recommend from check in to check everything was amazing!!!

perfect location, beautiful villa with jungle view. 
Gets a bit spooky at night with all the nocturnal insects out.
Very private and peaceful.
Can do better with the breakfast.
Such a stunning villa! It‚Äôs super big and I love the nature sounds. It‚Äôs so beautiful and I loved my stay. The staff were so friendly and pretty close to town. Thank you.
This villa was the most beautiful place I‚Äôve ever stayed. It‚Äôs impossible not to enjoy your stay. Gorgeous! Tranquil! And the bathroom! Wish I could live there forever
An amazing stay, 100% worth it. The staff go above and beyond and we felt like we were transported to our own sanctuary, incredible. Would absolutely recommend.
loved my stay in casa pohon. Beautiful villa and great staff. I definitly recommend it!
the place was amazing and exceeded our expectations :)
Hidden Heaven üòç Amazing Views & Professional Team
It was just perfect. Thank you!
